Home.title: Hi, I'm Ludwing üëã, Full Stack Web Developer
Home.subtitle: I specialize in creating innovative web solutions using a variety of technologies. My experience in the field has helped me hone my skills and tackle various challenges in web development.
Home.subtitle2: I have worked on system development from start to finish. From planning and designing databases to creating intuitive user interfaces and continuous implementation, I ensure that every stage of the project is successful.
Home.service1Description: I create high-quality websites and mobile applications tailored to your business needs. Whether you need to enhance your online presence or develop a new app, I handle both front-end and back-end development.
Home.service2Description: I work to improve user experience with intuitive and effective designs. I research and design interfaces to ensure users enjoy a smooth and satisfying experience, increasing satisfaction and retention.
Home.service3Description: I provide support at every stage of the project, from requirements analysis and design to development, testing, and implementation. I ensure to deliver comprehensive solutions tailored to your specific needs.
Home.subtitle3: Explore my projects, each completed with passion and delivered on time, exceeding expectations

Aboutme.title: Hello, I'm Ludwing üëã
Aboutme.subtitle: Passionate about web development and evolving technology. With a background in IT Systems and currently pursuing Systems Engineering, I‚Äôve developed skills in analysis, design, and system development. I specialize in creating digital experiences that blend code with creativity, adapting to both team collaboration and individual work.
Aboutme.subtitle2: Throughout my career, I have worked with a wide range of technologies that have allowed me to create complete and efficient solutions at every stage of development:

technologies.programmingLanguagesText: I am familiar with several languages, such as C#, Python, JavaScript, TypeScript.
technologies.frontendText: My experience includes Angular, React, Next.js, Astro, Bootstrap, Material UI, Shadcn, with which I build modern and efficient user interfaces.
technologies.backendText: I have a solid foundation in backend development, with proficiency in Node.js, Express.js, Laravel, and practical experience with PHP.
technologies.databasesText: I work with databases like PostgreSQL, MySQL, which allows me to create robust and efficient data-driven applications.
technologies.mobileDevelopmentText: My skills extend to mobile development, particularly with React Native currently and practical experience with Ionic.
technologies.toolsText: For my projects, I sometimes use a variety of tools such as Git, Postman, Visual Studio Code, Adobe Photoshop, Draw.io, Vercel, Supabase.

ProjectPage.title: Projects
ProjectPage.description: Explore some of the projects I have been involved in. Each project includes a detailed description and a sample image.

project1.title: Native and Web Application for Farmacia Santa Rosita
project1.name: Santa Rosita Manager
project1.description: Application in development to optimize and manage internal pharmacy processes, improving efficiency in inventory management, orders, and customer service.

project2.title: Web Application for the AstroboyXL Listening Party Event
project2.name: Astroboyxl.shop
project2.description: Web application for the AstroboyXL LISTENING PARTY event, for ticket purchase, user management, and buying exclusive products from the Trucho store.

project3.title: Mobile Web Application for CEA
project3.name: App CEA
project3.description: Mobile web app for the control and monitoring of wild animals rescued by the CEA of the Autonomous Departmental Government of Santa Cruz.

project4.title: Landing Page of My First Professional Portfolio
project4.name: Portfolio
project4.description: Landing Page for my first personal portfolio, where I could showcase my projects and skills.
